task.title: Add custom fields and tags to test results

taskbody.context: You can add custom fields and tags to test results. To understand more about custom fields and tags or how to create them, see .

step.cmd: Navigate to a test run result by clicking its ID number. click test run ID

Navigate to the Custom Fields and Tags section, you can select from the dropdown list the custom fields and tags to assign to your test result. You can also see for references on how to add or remove custom fields and tags. Test result custom fields and tags

taskbody.result: Your test result is successfully assigned with custom fields and tags.
